survey.name: birthday
survey.hint: If the exact date is unknown use an approximate date.
survey.constraint_message: You entered a birthday in the future. Perhaps your device doesn't have the correct date.
survey.label: When was the child born?
More than 2 months old

label.default: Weight in kilograms:
label.en_us: Weight in kilograms:
label.hindi: वज़न

survey.name: visit_type
survey.label: Is this an initial visit or follow-up?

label.default: ASK: Has the child had convulsions?
label.en_us: Ask: Has the child had convulsions?
label.hindi: पूछे: क्या शिशु को दौरे पढ़े थे?

label.default: Count the breaths in one minute.
label.hindi: एक मिनिट के लिए साँस गिने यदि सास की संख्या अधिक है तो दोबारा गिने.
label.en_us: Count the breaths in one minute. Repeat the count if elevated.

survey.name: breath_count_2
survey.label: Breath count is elevated. Repeat breath count.

label.default: Look for severe chest  indrawing.
label.hindi: पसली का अत्यधिक धन्सना देखें.
label.en_us: Look for severe chest  indrawing.

label.default: Look for nasal flaring.
label.hindi: नाक जगमगाता हुआ के लिए देखें.
label.en_us: Look for nasal flaring.

label.default: Look and listen for grunting.
label.hindi: कराहना सुने
label.en_us: Look and listen for grunting.

label.default: Is it possible to measure axillary temperature?
label.en_us: Is it possible to measure axillary temperature?
label.hindi: कक्षा तापमान को मापने के लिए संभव है?

label.default: Measure axillary temperature:
label.hindi: बगल का तापमान नापे (यदि संभव ना हो तो छूकर महसूस करें )
label.en_us: Measure axillary temperature:

label.default: Feel  for fever:
label.en_us: Feel  for fever:
label.hindi: तापमान देखें

label.default: Feel for low body temperature:
label.hindi: तापमान कम होने के लिए महसूस करें
label.en_us: Feel for low body temperature:

label.default: Is the young infant is lethargic or unconscious?
label.en_us: Is the young infant is lethargic or unconscious?
label.hindi: देखें, क्या शिशु सुस्त या बेहोश है?

label.default: Look at the young infant’s movements. Are they less than normal?
label.en_us: Look at the young infant’s movements. Are they less than normal?
label.hindi: शिशु का हिलना धुलना देखें, क्या वे सामान्य से कम है?

label.default: Look for skin pustules. Are there 10 or more skin pustules or a big boil?
label.en_us: Look for skin pustules. Are there 10 or more skin pustules or a big boil?
label.hindi: त्वचा पर फोड़े / फुंसी देखें. क्या १० या ज़्यादा या एक बड़ा फोढा है?

survey.name: umbilicus_draining_pus
survey.comments: I have reordered these two questions because they do not require urgent attention

label.default: Look at the  umbilicus. Is it red or draining pus?
label.hindi: नाभि देखें, क्या नाभि लाल है या पीप निकल रा है?
label.en_us: Look at the  umbilicus. Is it red or draining pus?

label.default: Are there any skin pustules?
label.hindi: त्वचा पर फोड़े / फुंसी देखें. क्या १० या ज़्यादा या एक बड़ा फोढा है?
label.en_us: Are there any skin pustules?

label.default: CLASSIFICATION: POSSIBLE SERIOUS BACTERIAL INFECTION
label.en_us: CLASSIFICATION: POSSIBLE SERIOUS BACTERIAL INFECTION
label.hindi: संभावित: गंभीर जीवन संक्रमण (इन्फेक्षन)

prompts.hint:
SIGNS:
  • Convulsions or
  • Fast breathing (60 breaths per minute or more) or
  • Severe chest indrawing or
  • Nasal flaring or
  • Grunting or
  • 10 or more skin pustules or a big boil or
  • If axillary temperature 37.5°C or above (or feels hot to touch) or temperature less than 35.5°C (or feels cold to touch) or
  • Lethargic or unconscious or
  • Less than normal movements

label.default: This child needs URGENT attention, complete the assessment and pre-referral treatment immediately so referral is not delayed.
label.en_us:
This child needs URGENT attention, complete the assessment 
and pre-referral treatment immediately so referral is not delayed.

prompts.name: give_first_dose_of_cotrimoxazole
prompts.comments: there are some charts for this and for consoling the mother, not sure if they should be used here.

label.default: Give first dose of cotrimoxazole if able to take orally (½ Pediatric tablet for an infant up to 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)
label.hindi: अगर मूह से ले सकता है तो कोटरिमोक्षज़ोल की पहली खुराक (एक महीने की उम्र तक के शिशु को बाकछे वाली आधी गोली और १ से २ महीने तक के शिशु को बचे वाली १ गोली) दे.
label.en_us: Give first dose of cotrimoxazole if able to take orally (½ Pediatric tablet for an infant up to 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)

label.default: Advise mother to continue breastfeeding
label.en_us: Advise mother to continue breastfeeding
label.hindi: स्तनपान जारी रखने की सलाह दे.

label.default: Warm the young infant by Skin to Skin contact if feels cold to touch.
label.en_us: Warm the young infant by Skin to Skin contact if feels cold to touch.
label.hindi: अगर छूने पर ठंडा लगता है तो शिशु को 'त्वचा से त्वचा' लगा कर रखें.

label.default: Refer URGENTLY to hospital.
label.en_us: Refer URGENTLY to hospital.
label.hindi: तुरंत अस्पताल रेफर करें.

prompts.name: local_bacterial_infection_agree
prompts.hint:
SIGNS:
  • Umbilicus red or draining pus
  • Skin pustules less than 10

label.default: CLASSIFICATION: LOCAL BACTERIAL INFECTION
label.hindi: स्थानीए जीवानू संक्रमण (लोकल इन्फेक्षन).
label.en_us: CLASSIFICATION: LOCAL BACTERIAL INFECTION

prompts.name: give_oral_cotrimoxazole_5_days
prompts.comments: there are some charts for this and for consoling the mother, not sure if they should be used here.

label.default: Give oral cotrimoxazole for 5 days. (½ Pediatric tablet twice daily for an infant upto 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)
label.hindi: कोटरिमोक्षज़ोल की खुराक (१ महीने की ऊम्र तक के शिशु को बाकछे वाली आधी गोली और १ से २ महीने तक के शिशु को बाकछे की १ गोली) ५ दिन तक दिन मैं दो बार दें.
label.en_us: Give oral cotrimoxazole for 5 days. (½ Pediatric tablet twice daily for an infant upto 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)

label.default: Teach mother to apply 0.5% Gentian Violet paint twice daily.
label.en_us: Teach mother to apply 0.5% Gentian Violet paint twice daily.
label.hindi: मा को संगयाए. ०.५% जनशन वायलाट ( जी वी) दावा दिन मैं दो बार लगायें.

label.default: Follow-up in 2 days.
label.en_us: Follow-up in 2 days.
label.hindi: दो दिन बाद पुन: देखें .

survey.name: has_diarrhoea
survey.hint:
What is diarrhoea in a young infant? 
If the stools have changed from usual 
pattern and are many and watery (more 
water than fecal matter). The normally 
frequent or loose stools of a breastfed 
baby are not diarrhoea.

label.default: Does the young infant have diarrhoea?
label.hindi: पूछें क्या शिशु को दस्त हैं?
label.en_us: Does the young infant have diarrhoea?

label.default: ASK: Is there blood in the stool?
label.en_us: ASK: Is there blood in the stool?
label.hindi: पूछें क्या माल में खून आता है?

prompts.comments: Maybe have select multiple symptoms list instead?

label.default: Look at the young infant’s general condition. Is the infant:
label.en_us: Look at the young infant’s general condition. Is the infant:
label.hindi: शिशु की सामानया स्थिति देखें.

label.default: Lethargic or unconscious?
label.en_us: Lethargic or unconscious?
label.hindi: सुस्त या बेहोश है?

label.default: Restless and irritable?
label.en_us: Restless and irritable?
label.hindi: बेचेन्न या चिढ़चिढ़ा  है?

label.default: Does the infant have sunken eyes?
label.en_us: Does the infant have sunken eyes?
label.hindi: धँसी हूई आखें के लिए देखें.

label.default: Pinch the skin of the abdomen. Does it go back:
label.en_us: Pinch the skin of the abdomen. Does it go back:
label.hindi: पेट की त्वचा पर चिकोटी भरें, यह काए वापस जाता है?

prompts.hint:
Two of the following signs:
  • Lethargic or unconscious
  • Sunken eyes
  • Skin pinch goes back very slowly

label.default: CLASSIFICATION: SEVERE DEHYDRATION
label.hindi: गंभीर निर्जलीकरण
label.en_us: CLASSIFICATION: SEVERE DEHYDRATION

prompts.hint:
Two of the following signs:
  • Restless, irritable.
  • Sunken eyes.
  • Skin pinch goes back slowly.
prompts.comments: simplify this formula w/ a calculate

label.default: CLASSIFICATION: SOME DEHYDRATION
label.hindi: कुछ निर्जलीकरण
label.en_us: CLASSIFICATION: SOME DEHYDRATION

label.default:
Give first dose of oral cotrimoxazole if able to take 
orally (½ Pediatric tablet for an infant upto 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)
label.en_us:
Give first dose of oral cotrimoxazole if able to take 
orally (½ Pediatric tablet for an infant upto 1 month and 1 tablet for an infant 1-2 months)
label.hindi:
अगर मूह से ले सकता है तो कोटरिमोक्षज़ोल की पहली खुराक (एक महीने की उम्र 
तक के शिशु को बाकछे वाली आधी गोली और १ से २ महीने तक के शिशु को बचे वाली
 १ गोली) दे.

label.default:
Refer URGENTLY to hospital 
with mother giving frequent sips 
of ORS on the way.
label.en_us:
Refer URGENTLY to hospital 
with mother giving frequent sips 
of ORS on the way.
label.hindi: तुरंत अस्पताल रेफर करें व रास्ते मैं शिशु को ओ. आर. एस देते रहें.

Advise mother to continue

label.default: Advise to keep the young infant warm.

Not enough signs to classify as

label.default: CLASSIFICATION: NO DEHYDRATION
label.hindi: निर्जलीकर्ण नही
label.en_us: CLASSIFICATION: NO DEHYDRATION

label.default:
1. Give fluids to treat diarrhea at home (Plan A).
  2. Advise home care.
  3. Follow up in 2 days if not improving.
label.en_us:
1. Give fluids to treat diarrhea at home (Plan A).
  2. Advise home care.
  3. Follow up in 2 days if not improving.
label.hindi: घर पर दस्त के ऊपचार के लिए शिशु की तरल पधार्थ दें. (प्लान ए: घर पर देख भाल की सलाह दें, अगर सुधार न हो दो दिन बाद पुन देखें.

survey.name: difficulty_feeding
survey.label: ASK: Is there any difficulty feeding?

survey.name: is_infant_breastfed
survey.label: ASK: Is the infant breastfed?

survey.name: breastfeedings_per_day
survey.label: ASK: How many times is the infant breastfed in 24 hours?

survey.name: other_foods
survey.label: ASK: Does the infant usually receive any foods or drinks other than breastmilk?

survey.name: other_foods_frequency
survey.label: ASK: How often does the infant receive other foods or drinks?

survey.name: use_to_feed
survey.comments: I'm going with type of food for now because we ask about breastfeeding above
survey.label: ASK: What do you use to feed the infant?

survey.name: indication_for_urgent_referral
survey.label: Is there any indication for urgent referral?

survey.name: breastfed_recently
survey.comments: Added back from original IMCNI chart based on correspondence with Amy/Manoj
survey.label: ASK: Has the infant breastfed in the previous hour?

survey.name: observe_breastfeed
survey.label: Ask the mother to put her infant to the breast. Observe the breastfeed for 4 minutes.

survey.name: able_to_attach
survey.label: Is the infant able to attach?

survey.name: attachment_quality_signs
survey.hint:
(All of these signs should be present if the 
attachment is good)
survey.comments: TODO: Reword? Ask "Is infant able to attach" then assess quality automatically from signs
survey.label: Look for the following signs to assess attachment:

survey.name: sucking_effectiveness
survey.hint: Clear a blocked nose if it interferes with breastfeeding.
survey.label: Is the infant suckling effectively (that is,  slow deep sucks, sometimes pausing)?

survey.name: ulcers_thrush
survey.label: Look for ulcers or white patches in the mouth (thrush).

survey.name: breastfeeding_pain
survey.label: ASK: Does the mother have pain while breastfeeding?

survey.name: breast_problems
survey.comments: Modified to include flat/inverted/cracked nipple based on correspondence with Manoj
survey.label: Look and feel for breast problems:

survey.comments: How do I determine able_to_feed? Is it different from able to attach?

survey.condition: selected(data('able_to_attach'),'no') || selected(data('sucking_effectiveness'), 'not_effective') || selected(data('sucking_effectiveness'), 'none') || Number(data('breastfeedings_per_day')) < 8 || selected(data('ulcers_thrush'), 'present') || countSelected(data('breast_problems')) > 0

prompts.name: parse_mother_for_feeding
prompts.label: Praise the mother for feeding the infant well.

prompts.hint:
SIGNS:

Not well attached to breast or Not suckling effectively

or

Less than 8 breastfeeds in 24 hours

or

Receives other foods or drinks

or

Thrush (ulcers or white patches in mouth).

or

Breast or nipple problems
prompts.label: CLASSIFICATION: FEEDING PROBLEM

prompts.name: teach_correct_positioning
prompts.comments: TODO: Link to information section on P.4
prompts.label: Infant is not well attached or not suckling effectively. Teach correct positioning and attachment.

prompts.name: increase_frequency_of_feeding
prompts.label: If breastfeeding less than 8 times  in 24 hours, advise to increase frequency of feeding.

prompts.comments: TODO: For conditional questions verify that phrasing can be changed to leave out the “if”.
prompts.label: Infant is receiving other foods or drinks. Counsel mother about breastfeeding more, reducing other foods or drinks, and using a cup and spoon.

If not breastfeeding at all, 
advise mother about giving 
locally appropriate animal milk 
and teach the mother to feed 
with a cup and spoon.

If thrush, teach the mother to 
apply 0.25% Gentian Violet 
paint twice daily

prompts.comments: TODO: Link to information section on P.4 Will need to ref breast_problems
prompts.label:
If breast or nipple problem, 
teach the mother to treat breast 
or nipple problems.

prompts.hint: (Breastfeed infant exclusively, keep infant warm, apply nothing to cord, ask mother to wash hands and explain danger signs in the infant)
prompts.label:
Advise mother to give home 
care

CLASSIFICATION:

NOT ABLE TO FEED - POSSIBLE SERIOUS BACTERIAL INFECTION

prompts.name: warm_skin_to_skin
prompts.label: Warm the young infant by Skin to Skin contact if feels cold to touch.

survey.name: needed_vaccinations
survey.comments:
PROBLEMS:
We want a way to filter the choices by age.
It would be nice to have a way to get the compliment of a selected set.
survey.label: Which vaccinations has the child NOT received?

survey.name: other_problems
survey.comments: Added based on correspondence with Amy/Manoj
survey.label: Does the child have any other problems?

survey.name: refer_for_other_problems
survey.label: Refer the child to a doctor for detailed assessment.

attachment_quality_sign.name: visible_areola
attachment_quality_sign.label:
More areola visible above than below the 
mouth
